dict.acceptation: 在深处；浓浓地；强烈地；精心地；

sent.orig: Just consenting. Breath deeply, slowly and deeply.
sent.trans: 只要同意。深深地呼吸，缓慢地、深深地呼吸。

sent.orig: Ever, I love deeply most of girl, I deeply of wish you.
sent.trans: 曾经，我最深爱的女孩，我深深的祝福你。

sent.orig: Ever, I love deeply most of girl, I deeply of love you.
sent.trans: 曾经，我最深爱的女孩，我深深的爱你。

sent.orig: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, loving someone deeply gives you courage.
sent.trans: 被爱给你力量，爱人给你勇气。

sent.orig: You believe deeply in your system, and we believe just as deeply in our system.
sent.trans: 你们深信你们的制度，我们也同样深信我们的制度。
